content: We'll have a breakout today (Saturday) at the Connectathon on using profiles to transform FHIR resources for analytics as well as API use cases.
A (somewhat dated) intro to the concept: https://github.com/chrisgrenz/FHIR-Primer/wiki/Profiled-FHIR
Does anyone know if this was captured/documented anywhere regarding the analytic use cases?
If not, I would be willing to take a pass at it and post back.
